group_1.textCenter: Arrrgh! [chara:100901:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]You're so late!@It's gonna start soon!
What are you doing?! I've been messaging@you like crazy... Why won't you answer?
(It's been ages since we hung out like@this without Witch hunting first, too...)
(Why does she have to@be late on a day like this?)

group_1.textLeft: Hello?! Where the heck are@you and what are you doing?
You know what time the@concert starts, don't you?!
Yeah, well it's already started!

group_1.textRight: Argh!@I know, I get it!
But there's nothin' I can@do about that right now.

group_1.textLeft: Are you KIDDING me?!@You better have a good excuse!
Look, just tell me where you are!

group_1.textRight: Uhhh, let's see...@I'm kind of at...[chara:101001:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]Seaside Park...

group_1.textLeft: Seaside Park?!
What the hell are you doing there?!

group_1.textRight: I'm tryin' to apologize, okay!@[chara:101001:motion_200]I'll leave right this—

group_1.textLeft: Stay there!@I'll come to you!

group_1.textRight: You'll what?! But it's—!

group_1.textLeft: Don't move a muscle!
Okay, there she is... Careful, she's...@She's scarier than any Witch...

group_1.textRight: Youuu little...!

group_1.textLeft: I-I'm so sorry!

group_1.textRight: ...Eh?@What the?!

group_1.textLeft: You're not the one who has to apologize!

group_1.textRight: What, exactly, is going on here...?

group_1.textLeft: I found another Magical Girl!
I just, you know...found her on the way@to the show. She was fightin' a Witch.

group_1.textRight: ...And you thought "This looks like@a job for Momoko," didn't you?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! Exactly!
Er... Hey! @Quit makin' fun of me!

group_1.textRight: ...You really will stick your@nose into anything, won't you...!

group_1.textLeft: She was just trying to...@I mean, I can't really fight, so...

group_1.textRight: Don't sweat it!@I totally got all up in your business.
Plus that Witch would've been@trouble for anyone, trust me!

group_1.textLeft: Y-you really think so...?

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah!@That was one tough Witch!
Old, young, man, woman...@You name it! They'd all struggle!

group_1.textLeft: That's...just about everyone...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, well I was tryin' [chara:101001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]to make@a point, so I exaggerated!

group_1.textLeft: Hehe...!

group_1.textRight: (...Unbelievable... She really can@make friends with just about anyone...)

group_1.narration: She's pretty much my only friend...
But Momoko makes fast friends@of anyone and everyone she meets...

group_1.textRight: So, yeah!@She's another Magical Girl like us and, um...
Yeah, great.@Are you going to keep me waiting...?

group_1.textLeft: All right already!@I said I'm sorry!

group_1.textRight: I've been looking forward@to this concert, y'know.
(We've never been out on our own@so far away from home before...)
(Being able to hang out with you...@I was really excited...)

group_1.textLeft: I'll make it up to you! Honest!
I know![chara:101001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_200] We can go to the cafe by the station!@With the red bean parfait! [chara:101001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]You like that!

group_1.textRight: Let's just go already...

group_1.textLeft: All right then, we're off!
Okay!@Thanks again!
